Package com.continuuity.weave.api

Classes in this package provides core functionality of the Weave library.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Command Represents command objects.
EventHandlerContext Represents runtime context for EventHandler.
EventHandlerSpecification Specification for EventHandler.
LocalFile This interface represents a local file that will be available for the container running a WeaveRunnable.
ResourceReport This interface provides a snapshot of the resources an application is using broken down by each runnable.
ResourceSpecification This interface provides specifications for resource requirements including set and get methods for number of cores, amount of memory, and number of instances.
RunId Represents the unique ID of a particular execution.
RuntimeSpecification Specifications for runtime requirements.
SecureStore Represents storage of secure tokens.
ServiceAnnouncer This interface provides a way to announce the availability of a service.
ServiceController This interface is for controlling a remote running service.
WeaveApplication Represents a application that can be launched by Weave.
WeaveContext Represents the runtime context of a WeaveRunnable.
WeaveController For controlling a running application.
WeavePreparer This interface exposes methods to set up the Weave runtime environment and start a Weave application.
WeaveRunnable The WeaveRunnable interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed in a Weave cluster.
WeaveRunnableSpecification Represents a specification of a WeaveRunnable.
WeaveRunner This interface prepares execution of WeaveRunnable and WeaveApplication.
WeaveRunner.LiveInfo Interface to represents information of a live application.
WeaveRunnerService A WeaveRunner that extends Service to provide lifecycle management functions.
WeaveRunResources Information about the container the WeaveRunnable is running in.
WeaveSpecification Represents specification of a WeaveApplication.
WeaveSpecification.Builder.AfterOrder  
WeaveSpecification.Builder.AfterRunnable  
WeaveSpecification.Builder.FirstOrder  
WeaveSpecification.Builder.LocalFileAdder  
WeaveSpecification.Builder.MoreRunnable  
WeaveSpecification.Builder.NextOrder  
WeaveSpecification.Order Defines execution order.
 

Class Summary
AbstractWeaveRunnable This abstract class provides default implementation of the WeaveRunnable.
Command.Builder Builder for creating Command object.
EventHandler A callback handler for acting on application events related to WeaveRunnable lifecycle events.
EventHandler.TimeoutAction Represents action to act upon runnable launch timeout.
EventHandler.TimeoutEvent This class holds information about a launch timeout event.
ResourceSpecification.Builder Builder for creating ResourceSpecification.
WeaveRunnableSpecification.Builder Builder for constructing WeaveRunnableSpecification.
WeaveSpecification.Builder Builder for constructing instance of WeaveSpecification.
 

Enum Summary
ResourceSpecification.SizeUnit Unit for specifying memory size.
WeaveSpecification.Order.Type  
 

Package com.continuuity.weave.api Description

Classes in this package provides core functionality of the Weave library.
